description: see http://hl7.org/fhir/json.html#schema for information about the FHIR Json Schemas

allOf.description: Record details about the anatomical location of a specimen or body part.  This resource may be used when a coded concept does not provide the necessary detail needed for the use case.

identifier.description: Identifier for this instance of the anatomical location.

active.description: Whether this body site is in active use.

code.description: Named anatomical location - ideally coded where possible.

qualifier.description: Qualifier to refine the anatomical location.  These include qualifiers for laterality, relative location, directionality, number, and plane.

description.description: A summary, charactarization or explanation of the anatomic location.

image.description: Image or images used to identify a location.

patient.description: The person to which the body site belongs.
